Quality beats price!

LayoutNode.Content: These shorts have a great comfortable fit. Perfect length and the material is comfortable andbreathing. Quality above price on these!
LayoutNode.SRC: These shorts have a great comfortable fit. Perfect length and the material is comfortable and breathing. Quality above price on these!
00

LayoutNode.Content: I bought 2 pair of theses shorts, and although the fit is good, whoever the quality control geniuswas who approved the "snap" fastener is should be fired. Don't bend over quickly, or expect alot of activity wearing these shorts ... they WILL unbutton. I'm probably taking them back, eventhough I like the look of them. See more
LayoutNode.SRC:
I bought 2 pair of theses shorts, and although the fit is good, whoever the quality control genius was who approved the "snap" fastener is should be fired. Don't bend over quickly, or expect a lot of activity wearing these shorts ... they WILL unbutton. I'm probably taking them back, even though I like the look of them.

LayoutNode.Content: They were comfortable and I liked the fit, the fabric and the comfort waistband.... I also havethe same problem as the previous reviewer...The snap pops constantly. Too bad ....I reallyliked them.
